ComicInfo.Summary: While Areala contemplates the revelations made to her by Cardinal Stark, madness threatens to engulf the Arab world. Inexplicably enticed by Az Rabah's charisma and the fanatical preaching of Hafidh Aziz, even moderate Arab nations rally to his cause and become subservient to his will. In an effort to save the world from the ultimate evil that is Az Rabah, the Vatican launches an all-out attack on his headquarters in Libya. As a member of the Vatican's strike force, Areala believes that she has an opportunity to demonstrate to her superiors that the Warrior Nuns are still a viable defense force.
ComicInfo.Tags: Az Rabah,Cardinal Stark,Cardinal X,Father Duvalier,Father Fang,Father Goth,Father Kubiczek,Father McCane,Father Sebastian Crowe,Father Stone,Father Webb,Magic Priests,Mother Superion,Warrior Nun Areala
